Posts.Content: I've just joined, that's why I'm late to respond. My friend has Stage 4, Her-2 Positive Breast Cancer. She has been though the works also. Along with her chemo treatments she has been taking Herceptin([url]www.herceptin.com[/url]) and Zometa ([url]www.Zometa.com[/url]) every 3-weeks since October 2007. She has been cancer free since January 08. Please look at the websites. Prayers are answered.
Posts.Title: Her 2 Positive Breast Cancer ... Help !!
